item.name: Transaction

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST "https://api.whatsonchain.com/v1/bsv/main/tx/raw" \
  --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --data "{\"txhex\": \"hex...\" }"

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST "https://api.whatsonchain.com/v1/bsv/main/txs" \
  --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --data "{\"txids\" : [\"294cd1ebd5689fdee03509f92c32184c0f52f037d4046af250229b97e0c8f1aa\",\"91f68c2c598bc73812dd32d60ab67005eac498bef5f0c45b822b3c9468ba3258\" ] }"

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST "https://api.whatsonchain.com/v1/bsv/main/txs/status" \

  --data "{\"txids\" : [\"294cd1ebd5689fdee03509f92c32184c0f52f037d4046af250229b97e0c8f1aa\",\"91f68c2c598bc73812dd32d60ab67005eac498bef5f0c45b822b3c9468ba3258\" ] }"

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST "https://api.whatsonchain.com/v1/bsv/main/tx/decode" \

  --data "{\"txhex\": \"hex...\" }"
